tests.name: Single Char Fails due to case sensitive
tests.output: No, 'A' is not a permutation of 'a'.

tests.name: Same Length not permutation test
tests.output: No, 'lorem' is not a permutation of 'moral'.

tests.name: Similar up to last letter not permutation test
tests.output: No, 'lorem' is not a permutation of 'loren'.

tests.name: Same size same letters same order flip repetition amount not perm
tests.output: No, 'hhhha' is not a permutation of 'haaaa'.
